item.title: [DISTRELEC-3518] Overwrite Movex order export file after one week

comments.comment:
At the monent, the movex export files are deleted after three day.
Is this on purpose.
Can I rely on it or do if have to make sure,
the files are overwritten after seven days?

The Files are deleted automatically only on production.
To have clean files on DEV and Test as well I've fixed this issue.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3509] Bug in nexus.ensighten.com/distrelec/dev/Bootstrap.js
item.description:
The script used in https://nexus.ensighten.com/distrelec/dev/Bootstrap.js is most probably outdated.
It contains a JavaScript statement, that loads a resource /www.google.com from our development servers.

(new Image).src="www.google.com"

Please update that script!

The script returned in the live version looks different and has a different (correct) behavior http://nexus.ensighten.com/distrelec/distrelecCH/Bootstrap.js
item.summary: Bug in nexus.ensighten.com/distrelec/dev/Bootstrap.js

comments.comment: Has been fixed by Angel
No change in our core required. Script on nexus.ensighten.com has bee changed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3502] Change password with too short password length
item.description: If a user changes the password to a new password that is <6 chars long, an error message is displayed. But the new (too short password is saved).
item.summary: Change password with too short password length

comments.comment:
Verified:
- Happens in my account!
- The password reset funciton via token email for logged-out users works fine.
Fixed! Mistake was that the form validation occured after the changePassword method has been called.
verified, works

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3501] FactFinder: all except one filter per facet get lost if sorting function is used
item.description:
Based on customer feedback.

Example:

  • go to category page http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/L%C3%B6ten/Stationen-f%C3%BCr-L%C3%B6t-%2C-Entl%C3%B6t-und-Rework-Arbeiten/c/cat-L3D_525437
  • select Ersa, Metcal, OK International
  • change the sorting
    => all except the last manufacturer selected are lost!

this happens per facet.
If multiple values are selected from multiple facets, one value per facet survives.
item.summary: FactFinder: all except one filter per facet get lost if sorting function is used

comments.comment:
The URL which is called to change the sorting is created in JavaScript. There seems to be a problem if the URL contains multiple parameters with the same name. This is the case if a user selects multiple facet values from the same facet group.

Example:
URL: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/L%C3%B6ten/Stationen-f%C3%BCr-L%C3%B6t-%2C-Entl%C3%B6t-und-Rework-Arbeiten/c/cat-L3D_525437?q=*&filter_Category3=Stationen+f%C3%BCr+L%C3%B6t-%2C+Entl%C3%B6t-und+Rework-Arbeiten&filter_Manufacturer=Ersa&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Manufacturer=Metcal
Parameter 1: filter_Manufacturer=Ersa
Parameter 2: filter_Manufacturer=Metcal

See productlist-order.js -> bindChangeEventListener -> Tc.Utils.splitUrl
Resolved (as described by Cornel).
verified, works

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3499] FE: Orderhistory - items below "show more" different than above
item.description:
Note: a CR was implemented recently by rhusi, the "besteller" was added to the list.

The information item "bestellt von" is only visible for the first 10 items, but not for the next 10.
Also the position of the "arrow right" icon varies, should always be the same.
item.summary: FE: Orderhistory - items below "show more" different than above

comments.comment:
Benötige ein zusätzliches Feld "orderedby" im folgenden JSON:

https://distrelec-ch.local:9002/my-account/order-history/next?page=1&sort=byDate:desc&status=ALL&orderNumber=&fromDate=&toDate=

As discussed, you can just add your attribute in the following file:
/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/WEB-INF/views/desktop/pages/terrific/account/accountOrderHistoryNextPage.jsp
Resolved.
verified

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3486] Proxy error during customer login
item.description:
Customer tries to login. After endless loading he gets a proxy error.
I've tried it as well. Same behaviour.

User: office@ilee.ch
PW: 123456
item.summary: Proxy error during customer login

comments.comment: CH shop, apparently

Since this user has many many shopping-list, we assume this problem is related to the number of shopping-list.
I continue analyzing....

@Pascal: Can you please check the "shopping-list" populator used to display the first 5 shopping lists in navigation and also the populator used on https://distrelec-ch.local:9002/shopping (managing shopping-lists). Will the products be loaded to display the number of products in each list?

Analysis in HP-Q:

There are some jolly guys using more than 100 shopping-lists:
310 devenogel
285 ak173
244 benn
172 aspag
144 qualcomm
133 office@ilee.ch <=====
124 elgotech
120 f&l
114 distrelecch
112 hwi_im
102 manfred borer
102 phmaillefer
100 wazner

The total number of products in all the shopping-lists per user:
3118 devenogel
2514 benn
1870 aspag
1548 ftbm
1392 qualcomm
1364 trans video
1328 distrelecch
1274 bag-ura
1108 hwi_im
1092 gregmudry
1084 uli
1056 laubesimon
1000 hld
998 office@ilee.ch <=====
Please use MiniWishlistConverter instead of WishlistConverter. - Done!
The issue with the multiple requests agains the AbstractPageController will be fixed in DISTRELEC-3516.

Handling of shopping lists is now around 100 times faster:

BEFORE:

/home
07 Mrz 2014 11:16:41 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP24] [DefaultNamicsWishlistFacade] Execution of getWishlists() took 405 ms.
07 Mrz 2014 11:16:42 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP28] [DefaultNamicsWishlistFacade] Execution of getWishlists() took 409 ms.
07 Mrz 2014 11:16:42 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP27] [DefaultNamicsWishlistFacade] Execution of getWishlists() took 409 ms.

/shopping
07 Mrz 2014 11:15:56 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP13] [DefaultNamicsWishlistFacade] Execution of getWishlists() took 368 ms.
07 Mrz 2014 11:15:56 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP13] [DefaultNamicsWishlistFacade] Execution of getWishlists() took 226 ms.
07 Mrz 2014 11:15:57 INFO [hybrisHTTP17] [WishlistController] Execution of getProductToggles() took 3 ms.
07 Mrz 2014 11:15:58 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP11] [DefaultNamicsWishlistFacade] Execution of getWishlists() took 578 ms.
07 Mrz 2014 11:15:58 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP16] [DefaultNamicsWishlistFacade] Execution of getWishlists() took 679 ms.

================================================================================================================

AFTER:

/home
10 Mrz 2014 08:54:10 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP37] [DefaultDistShoppingListFacade] Execution of getMiniWishlists() took 3 ms.
10 Mrz 2014 08:54:11 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP37] [DefaultDistShoppingListFacade] Execution of getMiniWishlists() took 3 ms.
10 Mrz 2014 08:54:11 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP38] [DefaultDistShoppingListFacade] Execution of getMiniWishlists() took 4 ms.

/shopping
10 Mrz 2014 08:53:24 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP44] [DefaultDistShoppingListFacade] Execution of getMiniWishlists() took 3 ms.
10 Mrz 2014 08:53:24 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP44] [DefaultDistShoppingListFacade] Execution of getMiniWishlists() took 0 ms.
10 Mrz 2014 08:53:25 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP33] [DefaultDistShoppingListFacade] Execution of getMiniWishlists() took 3 ms.
10 Mrz 2014 08:53:25 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP32] [DefaultDistShoppingListFacade] Execution of getMiniWishlists() took 3 ms.
10 Mrz 2014 08:53:25 DEBUG [hybrisHTTP44] [WishlistController] Execution of getProductToggles() took 5 ms.


As mentioned above AJAX calls still hit the "wrong" page controller. But this is not as bad as before.
For re-testing, please ensure correct handling of the different product lists (shopping lists, compare list, favorite list).

Did the testing on Q with
310 devenogel
133 office@ilee.ch

Result:
- Login is very fast OK
- Loading of a list that contains many articles was very slow, about 1 second per product in the list (probably same as before?) DISTRELEC-3555
- Handling of favorite list OK
- Handling of shopping list OK
- Add to compare list NOT WORKING for office@ilee.ch (but working for other test users & anonymous) DISTRELEC-3486

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3476] My Account - Company Information: Source of "Company Name" is wrong
item.description:
My Account -> Company Information:

The company name is taken from the first address in the list of addresses of the B2B unit
=> It should actually show the company name of the first billing address of the B2B unit
item.summary: My Account - Company Information: Source of "Company Name" is wrong

comments.comment:
Hi,

I see that there is a comment in the code from Reto Meier (10.09.2013) in the CompanyPageController.java :
// TODO get the right Address for the department,
// for B2B: shipping address of the unit, there is only one
// for B2B Key Account: shipping address with same id as company id.

This comment is in contradiction with your request.

Can you confirm that I can removed it and implement your request please?

Thank you,

Laurent

Yes I can - this was probably a misunderstanding and he actually meant to write "billing address".
For normal B2B customers there can only be one billing address but multiple shipping.

So yes -> the name definitely needs to come from the billing address.

Thank you.

Should I take care about the second part of the comment?
for B2B Key Account: billing address with same id as company id : There is no field on the address with this kind of information?

@Laurent: There will be an additional field Address.erpAddressID (String) starting of v2.0 (see data model page 4). So, the comment of Reto is correct, but only valid for the SAP case. The SAP implementation might add *multiple* billing addresses (in the key account B2B case). One of them has the same value in Address.erpAddressID like the B2BUnit.erpCustomerID. And this is the *main* billing address.

Due to the migration problem (will be hopefully fixed soon in DISTRELEC-3511) a B2BUnit might have multiple billing addresses. The correct one and maybe additional wrong ones. I have no idea how currently find the correct one. Maybe you/Nabil know?

My proposal:
- If there is only one billing address, use that one.
- If there are multiple billing addresses, use (as of v2.0) the one with the same value in erpAddressID like the B2BUnit.erpCustomerID.
- If non was found, use the first one.

Part of the 1.1.6 done.
I have to checkout the 2.0 branche to do the other part but I will finish other tasks from 1.2 before.
verified

attachment.name: Editor Adresse - hybris Management Console (hMC) - Mozilla Firefox_2014-03-05_14-28-01.png
attachment.author: lzamofing

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3459] CH/fr - date format in Filter not correct - Can not filter on dates
item.description:
CH/fr
Date format not correct. Can not perform any filtering.

Ch/de correct
item.summary: CH/fr - date format in Filter not correct - Can not filter on dates

comments.comment: @Cornel: Can you please take care about this issue? Please verify influence of session language.

There is a localization property which defines the format of the "from" and "to" date. The key of the property is "text.store.dateformat.datepicker.selection".

The German value of the property is "dd.mm.yy". I guess this value has been "translated" and is therefore "jj/mm/aa" for the French translation. Consider the format letters should always stay the same. Just change the sequence or the punctuation if necessary.

This bug can be fixed directly in the hMC under "Internationalisierung" --> "Sprachinhalte". Search for all the properties with the key mentionend above and correct the localizations.

There is no need to change any *.impex or *.properties files. The property seems to be right in the files.
please also adapt this in Q and DEV

Fixed on P and Q

CH/fr date format is dd.mm.yy
verified, works

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3455] Translation issue with modify Billing Address form for Guest checkout
item.description:
The Title of the form contain wrong translation.
German: Bearbeiten Sie Ihre billing Adresse
Italian: Modifica indirizzo billing

The problem is because the addressType is used as parameter for spring message:

Name of the message property: checkout.address.editForm.editAddress
English Value: Edit your {0} Address

The parameter is always "billing" and is not translatable.
item.summary: Translation issue with modify Billing Address form for Guest checkout

comments.comment: The issue is on all the websites (AT, IT, CH).
Also see related (duplicate) tickets

Nabil,
can this be solved by creating a new property for this?

This issue was discussed yesterday with David. The problem here is that this word is hard coded as well as many of titles. I think this one particularly was fixed by Laurent and already committed as I know. I will confirm that with him ASAP.

Nabil.
Fixed

It works again.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3400] Amend Hybris-cmscockpit access-rights (Webtrekk)
item.description:
As shortly directly pre-discussed with Laurent on 28th Feb. there is a need to config dedicated Hybris-cmscockpit access-rights as following:

Content-Manager Group Users: Shall newly have additional write-access to the 'Erweiterte WT Parameter-attribute (compare attached screenshot).

On the following dialog-window they can only click on the option 'Neues Element erstellen' (compare screenshot). To note: Tracking.Admin shall have the possibility to click on all options.

On the following dialog-window (compare screenshot) the following shall apply:

  • Schlüssel (default value): wt.campaignId -> Content-Group Manager cannot change the value / Tracking.admin can change the value
  • ID (default value): No value -> Content-Group Manager cannot add a value / Tracking.admin can add a value
  • Wert (default value): No value -> Content-Group Manager and Tracking.admin can add a value

Thx Mark
item.summary: Amend Hybris-cmscockpit access-rights (Webtrekk)

comments.comment:
Some rights (write) have been removed for the content manager group to edit wt advanced parameters.
New default value for the key field.
New editor area to remove some fields in the cms cockpit.

I had to revert this commit, because it doesn't compile.

   [yjavac] Compiling 1 source file to /Users/rhaemmerli/ws/src/distrelec-shop.deploy/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bcore/classes
   [yjavac] ----------
   [yjavac] 1. ERROR in /Users/rhaemmerli/ws/src/distrelec-shop.deploy/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bcore/gensrc/distrelecB2Bcore/GeneratedTypeInitializer.java (at line 19738)
   [yjavac] wt.campaignId,
   [yjavac] ^^
   [yjavac] wt cannot be resolved to a variable
   [yjavac] ----------
   [yjavac] 1 problem (1 error)

you can use:
svn merge -c -r7903 .

to get your changes back.
Bug fixed in items.xml. and reverted the changes from 7903.

Hi Laurent,

To test this amendment I am relying on cmscockpit page-edit rights for the two tracking-roles (admin & power-user). Please advise as soon as this is granted respectively on which environment I shall test.

Thx Mark

Any status-update in this regard?

Thx Mark

Hello,

I have looked to this issue with Raphael but we are not able to resolve it.
I have open a ticket on the jira from hybris (https://jira.hybris.com/browse/SUP-11513).

Regards,

Laurent

Hi Laurent,

Thanks for the status-update in this regard.

An additional question: Generally ticket is indicating that the task is fixed on v1.1.5. I have shortly verified that together with Marc Kraft (Content-Manager Group user) on http://test.distrelec.ch/cmscockpit/login.zul. The required functionality seems not be implemented. Please verify and advise accordingly.

Thx Mark

Hi,

Sorry for that, the access rights had not been played.
I have played it and now it's working.

Regards,

Laurent

Hi Laurent,

There is an amendment needed (sorry my fault!). I tested the implementation together with M. Kraft on http://test.distrelec.at/de/FLuke%20VT04/cms/flukevt04.

Current implementation: wt.wt.campaignId = 'wt_mc%253Dtest-mka1';

Required implementation: wt.campaignId = 'wt_mc%253Dtest-mka1';

Please note that 'wt.' is by default added by the backend-component (compare https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/810+-+Web+Analytics, CMS Site properties). Therefore only the string 'campaignId ' would need to be shown respectively transmitted as 'Schlüssel'

It would be great if you were able to fix that asap in order to make it in the upcoming v1.2 productive deployment.

Thx Mark

Hello.

Change done. You will have campaignId as default value after the next deployment.

Regards,

Laurent

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3363] Pickup in Distrelec store CH Text
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Enterprise
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
URL: https://test.distrelec.ch/checkout/address

In checkout, point 1 "Billing- and Shipment Adress", select pick up store, there is displayed to pick up the order at saturday between 08:00 am and 12:00 am, but Distrelec is closed on Saturday. (img_445_pzu)
item.summary: Pickup in Distrelec store CH Text

comments.comment: please delete this (HMC)
removed the value from hmc and modified the impex of warehouse essential data.

But we need two different time frames:
08:00-12:00 and 13:00-18:00

Morning
08:00 - 12:00

and you can place afternoon instead of Saturday.

Afternoon
13:00 - 18:00

The value has been changed to:
07:30 - 12:00 | 13:00 - 18:00
the issue is fixed

According with the attached email of Gilgen Michael the opening time must be:

Mo.-Fr.
07:30 – 18.00.
verified, ok on Q and P

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3291] Add-Products at Search Product-Listings
item.description:
Test-Case: Call http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone, Add the product 'iPhone 4 PowerSkin 1500 mAh, AP1201' to the basket -> corresponding Webtrekk-request screenshot attached

To be refactored:

1. productCost: So far '0.00' transmitted

2. cp10: According value is transmitted -> this shall only be the case when the a search-query is triggered (e.g. http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone)
This would also need to be refactored accordingly for .at.

Please verify that accordingly for similar functionalities (e.g. Add-to-Basket at Onsite-Search Overlay) as well as for .it.

Thx Mark
item.environment:
* OS: W7 SP1
* UA: Chrome 31.0.1650.63 m
item.summary: Add-Products at Search Product-Listings

comments.comment: Both issues seem already to be fixed on distrelec.at. Please see the following Screencast: http://recordit.co/7yLmcaZ5by

Hi Dominic

On distrelec.at the cp10-parameter is yet transmitted (compare attached screenshot).

Thx Mark
So this issue can be closed? If not, please explain further what needs to be changed.

E.g. http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone

* Currently: cp10-transmission is transmitted for all event function calls (compare attached screenshot)

* Required: No additional cp10-transmission for all event function calls

The cp10-parameter shall only be transmitted on the basis of the page-load of the search-query (e.g. http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone) respectively not on the basis of event function calls (as indicated)

Bests, Mark

All Webtrekk Events are enriched with the wt.custom Parameter of the current page. This is why the param is sent with the event. Do you still want to remove just this single param and keep all the others?
Discussed with Mark on the Phone: CP 10 should be removed. (CR)
Removed customParameter 10 from function calls.

attachment.name: Suchen iphone Distrelec AT Website - Google Chrome_2014-02-25_15-45-29.png
attachment.author: mdiggelmann

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2257] 9 Teaser-Tracking --> incomplete Teaser-requests
item.description:
FE-task - pre-discussed with Dominic at the meeting dated 6th Dec.

Unexpected behaviour (so far):

  • View-request: Only values from the first teaser-element are transmitted
  • Click-request: On click on a teaer-element no Teaser-request is transmitted
  • OS: W7
  • UA: FF 25.0
item.summary: 9 Teaser-Tracking --> incomplete Teaser-requests

comments.comment:
1st Webtrekk-feedback in this regard:

schaut mal auf die Attribute.
Ihr habt eienrseits die Eigentschauften (JSON-Objekt) auf dem name-Attribute definiert und andereseits in der JS ein anderes Attribut definiert das verwendet werden soll „…data…“.
Das kann nicht gehen.

Reply from Dominic regarding 1st Webtrekk-feedback:

Hallo Mark

Dein Code Ausschnitt ist von der Hero Teaser Komponente. Die funktioniert aber bereits wie Sie soll. Das Problem ist der Carpet. Anbei ein Screenshot vom Carpet Code:

Es gibt hier also kein JS und alle Items sind sichtbar beim Laden der Seite. Frag doch bitte beim Entwickler noch einmal kurz nach und leite ihm am besten meine Email weiter.
Wenn wir dann nicht weiterkommen können wir gerne einen Call machen.

Viele Grüsse Dominic

A direct contact to the teaser-plugin developer seems to be 'difficult' at to moment according to Webtrekk

2nd Webtrekk-feedback in this regard:

Hilft das: Das ist die Config bei euch im Plugin: "teaserAttribute" : "data-wt-teaser" (vgl. angehängter Screenshot)

Im HTML steht name=…. :

Laut Konfig suchen wir aber nach data-wt-teaser. Da wir data-wt-teaser nicht finden wird nichts erfasst.

...

MDI: Ist ein neuer Input von Webtrekk und war so nicht in der Plugin-Doku spezifiziert. Demnach bitte das 'name'-Attribut für das Teaser-Tracking durch 'data-wt-teaser' ersetzen.

Hallo Mark

Es funktioniert!

Habs in allen Modulen von Kapitel 9.1 & 9.2 angepasst, siehe https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation

Beim Carpet — Bei Pageload wird der zusätzliche wt Event getriggert und enthällt alle Teaser die du tatsächlich auf deinem Bildschirm sehen kannst.Wenn du dann nach unten Scrollst werden weitere wt Events gefeuert für die Teaser die neu ins Bild kommen.

Beim Hero Teaser — Das erste Item (Position 3) wird getriggert so wie beim Carpet. Klickt man nun durch den Hero Teaser werden per Javascript weitere Events ausgeführt. Ich muss beim Hero Teaser aber noch etwas anpassen, da manchmal ein falscher Event verwendet wird. Danach erst setze ich das Ticket auf resolved und gebe es dir zurück.

Was mir aufgefallen ist: Wenn ein Event mal nicht gefeuert wird, hilft es wenn man ein bisschen Scrollt!

Super - danke für den Hinweis. Freut mich, dass wir damit einen grossen Schritt weitergekommen sind.

Bests, Mark

Carpet is ok.

Rotating Teaser (Product Detail Page) is ok.

Carousel (Product Detail Page) is ok. The Carousel is now loaded via Ajax (was a performance issue) that's why we needed to change the implementation.

The new manual Carpet Component that is filled from top to botton, column by colum has different position parameters than the other components. Positions go from top to bottom and than to the right instead of from left to right and then down.

Hero Teaser: The one item that is visible on pageload should automatically be tracked. In my test, the wrong element is transmitted. I added the ckv param to that element, but it is transmitted anyway..

Hi Mark

The issues described in my latest comment my only be an issue on my local machine. Basically this ticket is resolved. However please test the teaser tracking once it is deployed and report back if some data is not correctly transmitted yet.

Thanks!

Hi Dominic

I) Regarding the Hero-Teaser: At my machine the pos.1 element is initially shown for approximately half a second (no teaser-request transmitted) and then directly the element with the pos. 4 (first teaser-request transmitted - compare screenshot).
Please investigate why no view (ck523) is tracked (blue-marked on screenshot) for the pos. 4 element. What I have recognised, is, that the pos. 4 element is the only one where the ckv-parameter is not set.

II) Carpet (compare two screenshots attached): There seems to be an issue regarding the Position Value (twice a value of '6' transmitted). An element does not contain an according teaser-tracking.

Thx Mark

Todo:

1. Rotating Teasers: Always add ckv param and track every item per JS (not the first visible one on page load without ckv and without js).
2. Carpet is ok as it is
Refactoring of all 9. Teaser Components done. Everything tested and should work as required.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3544] Movex order file issue
item.description:
We're having some issue with some lines in the order files (Header.log/Lines.log).

1. 00002G7N is available in Header and Lines but not complete in the Header file.
2. 00002G7P and 00002FFX are not existing in the header file and incorrect in lines file
item.summary: Movex order file issue

comments.comment:
Available in:

00002G7N = Lines: OK / Header: OK (incomplete)
00002G7P = Lines: OK / Header: Missing
00002FFH = Lines: Missing / Header: Missing
00002HOR = Lines: Missing / Header: Missing
00002FFL = Lines: Missing / Header: Missing
00002G7R = Lines: OK / Header: Missing
00002FG7 = Lines: OK / Header: Missing
00002FFX = Lines: OK / Header: Missing

In a nutshell:
- NFS ran out of space
- Order file could not be written / got corrupted

Actions taken:
- stopped export job
- removed corrupted order file
- removed "exported" flag from all orders of today
- re-started job to re-generate a clean order file

NFS had no space left on device.
- Export jobs stopped
- header.log / lines.log files moved away
- Orders from today marked as "exported=false"
- Export job restarted

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3535] Shipping Cost Calculation: Threshold value is wrong
item.description:
Example order:
...27TV
Total item value (Nettobetrag) is 97.50
-> Movex uses this value as the basis for the shipping cost calculation, considers 12.40
-> Hybris uses a higher value as the basis because it includes tax, it considers 9.25

Same problem occurs around the threshold of 500.- for free shipping.
item.summary: Shipping Cost Calculation: Threshold value is wrong

comments.comment: Cannot retest at the moment due to DISTRELEC-3548

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3534] Verify whether order status updates from Movex to Hybris are working properly
item.description:
There are hints that order status updates dont get from movex to hybris. If this is the case, customers could not file RMA requests.

Please verify exactly whether updates are coming through.
item.summary: Verify whether order status updates from Movex to Hybris are working properly

comments.comment:
Quick check in HMC revealed:
- There are only migrated orders in status "shipped". No orders created in the new shop have a status different than "00"
- It appears that the order status import never worked after the go-live

Correct. There are two issues:
- erpLastModified attribute is missing on the type MovexOrder
- In the CSV the transactionID is used instead of the hybrisOrderNumber

The missing attribute has been added.
Raphael Leu will change the export of Movex. So we should get the hybrisOrderNumber instead of the transactionID

The export from Movex side is changed.
Raphael Leu will send us a new full export tonight.
To be retested in P

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3512] Create archive job for Movex order export file
item.summary: Create archive job for Movex order export file

comments.comment:
/environment/env-hp-*-app00/static/cron/hybris_cleanup

ind /data/archive/erp/ -type f -mtime +90 -exec rm -f {} \;
( cd /data_nfs/env-hp-q/inout/erp/ ; tar -zcvf /data/archive/erp/movex_order_export_`date +'%Y%m%d'`.tar.gz target )

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3505] Webtrekk Carousel Teaser: wtTeaserTrackingId
item.description:
carousel-teaser.jsp Zeile 66: Der Wert von ${wtTeaserTrackingId} muss korrekt abgefüllt werden. "ch" ist jeweils das aktuelle Land.

1. Für Feedback Campaign Resultate: "ch.faf-c-f" (für Suchresultate und auf Kategorien FactFinder Resultate Seite)

2. Für Lazy Loaded auf Produkt Detail Seiten: "ch.faf-r" (Produktdetailseite)

3. Komponente manuell platziert: "ch.ons"

—-----

Frage: Gibt es den dritten Fall überhaupt noch? Ich bekomme in der Console den Fehler "productcarouselcomponent.jsp not found".
item.summary: Webtrekk Carousel Teaser: wtTeaserTrackingId

comments.comment:
Das Setzen der Webtrekk Teaser Tracking ID wurde wie folgt angepasst:

* DistProductCarouselComponent --> *.ons
* DistProductCookieCarouselComponent --> *.ons
* DistProductFFCarouselComponent (also-bought, recommendation) --> *.faf-r
* DistProductReferencesCarouselComponent --> *.ons
* Such-Resultatseite, Navigations-Resultatseite (Feedback-Campaign: pushed products) --> *.faf-c-f
Zur Info: Eine DistProductCarouselComponent kann bspw. auf einer Kategorie-Seite platziert werden.

item.summary: IT // Logout translation

comments.comment: Screenshot attached.
fixed
fixed

- ok on P
- still wrong on Q

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3223] Availability Info: Labels need to be maintainable per country
item.description:
The availability status (label and green/yellow/orange icon) depends on the stock level in the primary and secondary warehouses.

However the labels should be different by country, as e.g. an availability in the secondary warehouse leads to a label of "48 h" in CH, but "< 10 d" in AT.

SOLUTION

  • Labels for the availability info must be maintainable in site-specific property
  • as per Adi: /environment/common/hybris/config/local.properties, similar to payment settings
  • This concerns:
    • Availability labels on all product lists (including search, favorite, shopping, compare)
    • Availability label on product detail page
    • And also: The availability information within the info layer on the product detail page

Values for AT:
Status Info
green => "24 h"
light green => "< 10 d"
yellow => "> 10 d"
orange => "> 10 d"

Stock Level Info
"24 h"
"< 10 d"
"> 10 d (<date>)"
"> 10 d"

Values for CH:
Status Info
green => "24 h"
light green => "48 h"
yellow => "> 48 h"
orange => "> 48 h"

Stock Level Info
"24 h"
"48 h"
"> 48 h (<date>)"
"> 48 h"

Values for IT:

  • To be defined!
item.summary: Availability Info: Labels need to be maintainable per country

comments.comment: Labels are now loaded from local.properties and brought to frontend within the ajax call and then added to the content same as availability values.
Ticket is from frontend perspective done. There is one remaining issue that the label for backorder does not seem to be delivered to the frontend. Dishan is looking at it.
I have fixed by calling the correct method.
Done!

Florian,
please test the labels after the next deployment.
Please check it.

The labels for CH should to be changed into this (analog AT):

Values for CH:
Status Info
green => "24 h"
light green => "< 10 d"
yellow => "> 10 d"
orange => "> 10 d"

Stock Level Info
"24 h"
"< 10 d"
"> 10 d (<date>)"
"> 10 d"
Nabil, can you please change the labels for CH accordingly

Hi Raphael,

I have tried to change the ProductAvailabilityConverter as below :
private String getStatusLabelForCode(final String statusCode) {
  final BaseSiteModel currentBaseSite = getBaseSiteService().getCurrentBaseSite();
  Assert.notNull(currentBaseSite);
  final String currentBaseSiteUid = currentBaseSite.getUid();
  final String key = "availability." + statusCode + "." + currentBaseSiteUid;
  return getMessageSource().getMessage(key, null, getI18nService().getCurrentLocale());
}

getMessageSource().getMessage(key, null, getI18nService().getCurrentLocale()); return always an error (An exception occurred: org.springframework.context.NoSuchMessageException)

As I see, we use this call in the storefront (AccountPageController for example) but the object is not the same type :
org.springframework.context.support.ReloadableResourceBundleMessageSource: basenames=[/WEB-INF/messages/base]

If I call getMessageSource() in the facade (ProductAvailabilityConverter), it return a object of type :
type org.springframework.context.support.DelegatingMessageSource@628f8eb5

Could you help me to solve it please?

Laurent
Please change this immediately. Contact me if yoou need further infos. Thanks.

As discussed with Rafael, I have temporarly changed the properties in the local.properties as below :
# Stock Level Info
availability.primary.distrelec_CH=24 h
availability.secondary.distrelec_CH=< 10 d
availability.backordered.distrelec_CH=> 10 d
# Status Info
availability.green.distrelec_CH=24 h
availability.lgreen.distrelec_CH=< 10 d
availability.yellow.distrelec_CH=> 10 d
availability.orange.distrelec_CH=> 10 d

I have also changed it manually on all nodes from HP-P

Done.

Product availability labels are now in the base.properties files :
availability.backordered
availability.green
availability.lgreen
availability.orange
availability.primary
availability.secondary
availability.yellow

Fine, except that the first (green) status in the detail page info layer is wrong: it is showing > 10 d, but it should be 24 h (see screenshot)
example: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Vibrationsmessger%C3%A4t-2-200-mm-s-2-2000-m-s-10-5-kHz-RS232-Lutron-VB8200/p/17660046?q=messger%C3%A4t&page=19&origPos=16&origPageSize=10&simi=99.25

The other labels in the layer sees to be fine, and in product lists it correctly shows 24h.
I guess, Laurent is already working on this issue.

Yes, I have changed the impex to import after the deployment (https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/2014/03/11/Product+Availability).
I will import it again.
Looks good now : )

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3482] Sharing a product seach result fails
item.description:
Search for product by adding many facet values will result in a very long URL like this:
http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Stromversorgung-%26-Licht/Transformatoren/Regeltransformatoren/c/cat-L3D_525540?q=*&filter_Category3=Regeltransformatoren&filter_Manufacturer=Tufvassons+Transformator&filter_Buyable=1&filter_InStock=+1&filter_Ausgangsspannung~~VAC=0...260&filter_H%C3%B6he~~mm=100&filter_Price=119+-+142

If I want to share this with a fiend, the following error occurs:

04 Mar 2014 01:55:24 ERROR [hybrisHTTP44] [10.191.17.10] [error_page_log] a technical error occured [uuid: b1198072-b442-4a90-84aa-5d2053b64f8a].
de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.exceptions.ModelSavingException: java.sql.SQLException: ORA-12899: value too large for column "HYB_DIST_Q"."PROCESSES"."P_URL" (actual: 312, maximum: 255)

        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.converter.impl.ItemModelConverter.storeAttributes(ItemModelConverter.java:1273)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.converter.impl.ItemModelConverter.save(ItemModelConverter.java:669)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.model.impl.ModelWrapper.save(ModelWrapper.java:149)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.model.impl.ResolvingModelPersister.saveOthers(ResolvingModelPersister.java:106)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.model.impl.ResolvingModelPersister.persist(ResolvingModelPersister.java:91)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.model.impl.DefaultModelService.saveAllInternal(DefaultModelService.java:1171)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.model.impl.DefaultModelService.saveAll(DefaultModelService.java:1090)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.model.impl.DefaultModelService.save(DefaultModelService.java:735)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.event.DistSendToFriendEventListener.onEvent(DistSendToFriendEventListener.java:40)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.event.DistSendToFriendEventListener.onEvent(DistSendToFriendEventListener.java:1)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.event.DistSendToFriendEventListener$$EnhancerByCGLIB$$44e742cf.onEvent(<generated>)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.event.impl.AbstractEventListener.onApplicationEvent(AbstractEventListener.java:61)
        at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.event.impl.AbstractEventListener.onApplicationEvent(AbstractEventListener.java:1)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.event.DistSendToFriendEventListener$$EnhancerByCGLIB$$44e742cf.onApplicationEvent(<generated>)
item.summary: Sharing a product seach result fails

comments.comment:
Fields that are too short:
- AbstractDistPaymentMode.url
- DistSendToFriendProcess.url
distrelecB2Bcore-items.xml adjusted, using a longer field definition. (varchar2(2000))
For re-testing, please ensure the URL to share is longer than 255 chars.
Re-tested on HP-Q v1.1.6 => the long url of the example in this ticket still caused the share dialog to fail.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3467] Webtrekk Order-Confirmation Page Tracking if 'Abholen' was selected
item.description:
Critical -> 1st priority!

When a user is selecting 'Abholen' in the checkout-details (compare attached screenshot) the Webtrekk Order-Confirmation Page Tracking is not implemented (compare attached screenshot).
Please verify for .ch, .it and .at and refactor accordingly.

Bests, Mark
item.summary: Webtrekk Order-Confirmation Page Tracking if 'Abholen' was selected

comments.comment:
Dishan,
can you please have a look at this?

Hi Dishan,

Thanks for the clarification via phone. As discussed attached a schematic tracking-request screenshot referring to the 'order confirmation page'. As informed on the phone the Webtrekk-tracking shall be implemented accordingly for all existing confirmation-pages (pickup / approval / 'normal') given that a 'productive' has been placed. In terms of the URL to be transmitted respectively the required parameters and values please refer to the Webtrekk-Spec (p. 12/13) and/or Dominic.

Bests, Mark
Fixed

Hi Dishan,

Testing conducted (https://www.distrelec.ch/checkout/orderConfirmation/00002ID3 - compare attached screenshot).

To note: Only 'basic'-tracking implemented (all additional e-Commerce parameters are not transmitted). Also: The transmitted URL is not correct,
-> Please compare MDI-comment 04/Mar/14 12:38 PM: In terms of the URL to be transmitted respectively the required parameters and values please refer to the Webtrekk-Spec (p. 12/13) and/or Dominic.

Please refactor accordingly also for the Approval Order Confirmation Page.

Thx Mark

Dishan is on vacation.
Dominic, if it is a BE only problem please forward assign accordingly.

Ticket for Backend.

Implement page tracking accordingly.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3243] CatalogPlus Detailpage modifications
item.description:
Please modify the following points on the detailpage:

  • Breadcrumb: From home/shortdescription to home/service+/shortdescription
  • URL: catplus to serviceplus
  • Item number: ArtNr. to Type
  • Screenshot 1: Layout issue
  • Screenshot 2: The accordeons "Downloads" and "product information" are not working in Chrome
item.summary: CatalogPlus Detailpage modifications

comments.comment:
Hi Florian,

Breadcrumb and Url need to be adjusted by a Backend Engineer. I will assign the ticket to a BE afterwards.

I changed the label to be "type".

Could you please provide me a link to a page where I can see the layout issues and the accordeon bug? Thanks
Jan

http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Abgleichschraubendreher%2C-1-154-Bernstein---1-154/p/service+/90018039

You have to be logged in as B2B

Layout bugs (Catalog Plus item, Availability) and accordeon bug were caused by Francesco Bersani.
For Catplus and Availability, a wrong positioning was set. Also javascript call for getting the availability was sent, which is not needed on the catalog plus page. That caused a js exception and the accordeon did not work anymore.....

Bugs are fixed now.

Hi Pascal,

Could you pleas fix the breadcrumb and url issues. thanks

please define which page is linked behind the new breadcrumb entry.

and what is the url .../service+/... or .../serviceplus/...? it's not clear in the spec above.
Service+

??? is this the site? is this the url param? if yes is it really a upper "S"?

1) Which Page is linked behind the new breadcrumb entry?
2) What's the exact URL Parameter (upper-/lower-case)?

1)
Breadcrumb:
Home / Service+ / Abgleichschraubendreher, 1-154


2)
URL:
http://{domain}/{language}/p/service+/{catalogplus item type}

FE tasks: Done
url change to .../service+/...: already done by Nabil

the only thing which is open, is the bread crumb entry. And there, I need to know, what is linked behind the new entry "Service+"?

Will we have a problem if we define a static site (CMS page)?
Is it possible to dynamically put in a content page (per country)?
Otherwise do not defne a link (leave empty).

ok it's now maintainable via properties per cms site id

I've added following properties:
breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_AT=
breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_CH=
breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_IT=

so if you want to link the "Service+" breadcrumb entry for CH to the faq page, you have to change the property to "breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_CH=/cms/faq"

@Pascal: What about moving this config params to the global common local.poperties (/environment/common/hybris/config/local.properties)? I think there will be no difference between the environments - do you?

OK
1) Breadcrumb: From home/shortdescription to home/service+/shortdescription => OK
2) URL: catplus to serviceplus => OK
3) Item number: ArtNr. to Type => OK

Not OK
4) The accordeons "Downloads" and "product information" are not working in Chrome
=> The element "product information" is showing even if there is no info, e.g. on http://test.distrelec.ch/en/Abgleichschraubendreher-Satz%2C-7-teilig%2C-1-150-Bernstein---1-150/p/serviceplus/90206000
